On the return journey, the same trucks collect `<demand_backhaul>` kg of debris or damaged goods for disposal. Each vehicle’s `<capacity>` must accommodate both outbound supplies and inbound waste without exceeding limits. The challenge is balancing depot assignments to prioritize critical areas while optimizing routes for fuel efficiency and waste management.

title: Fashion Rental Outfit Delivery and Return Logistics
content: A clothing rental service operates regional hubs (`<loc_depot>`) to distribute `<demand_linehaul>` units of trendy outfits to `<num_customer>` customer locations (`<loc_customer>`). title: Aquaculture Feed Delivery and Fish Harvest Retrieval

title: Industrial Lubricant Delivery and Empty Drum Retrieval
